content: मंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंद्-अच्] {@--1@} Slow, tardy, inactive, lazy, dull, loitering; (न) --भिंदंति मंदां गतिमश्वमुख्यः <ls>Ku. 1. 11</ls>; तच्चरितं गोविंदे मनसिजमंदे सखी प्राह <ls>Gīt. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Cold, indifferent, apathetic. {@--3@} Stupid, dull-witted, foolish, ignorant, weak-brained; प्रयोजनमनुद्दिश्य न मंदोपि प्रवर्तते <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; मंदोप्यमंदतामेति संसर्गेण विपश्चितः <ls>M. 2. 8</ls>; मंदः कवियशः पार्थी गमिष्याम्युपहास्यतां <ls>R. 1. 3</ls>; द्विषंति मंदाश्चरितं महात्मनां <ls>Ku. 5. 75.</ls> {@--4@} Low, deep, hollow (as sound). {@--5@} Soft, faint, gentle; as in मंदस्मितं. {@--6@} Small, little, slight; मंदोदरी; see अ also. {@--7@} Weak, defective, feeble; as मंदाग्नि. {@--8@} Unlucky, unhappy. {@--9@} Faded. {@--10@} Wicked, vile {@--11@} Addicted to drinking. {@--12@} Weak, slack (as a bow). {@--13@} Sick, afflicted with disease. {@--14@} Independent. (स्वतंत्र) --दः {@--1@} The planet Saturn. {@--2@} An epithet of Yama. {@--3@} The dissolution of the world. {@--4@} A kind of elephant; मंदोपि न म न महनवगृह्य साध्यः <ls>Śi. 4. 49</ls> (where मंद means ‘a fool’ also). {@--5@} The apsis of a planet's course. --दा A pot, vessel. --दं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Slowly, gradually, by degrees; यातं यच्च नितंबयोर्गुरुतया मंदं विलासादिव <ls>Ś. 2. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Gently, softly, not violently; मंदं मंदं नुदति पवनश्चानुकूलो यथा त्वां <ls>Me. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Faintly, feebly, weakly, lightly. {@--4@} In a low tone, deeply.
